name: Soccer Winner Coach 2018
description:
Be the coach or manager of your favorite team and win the World Championship!

The final results of the World Championship 2018 depends on you.

Choose one of the 32 national teams and take over the role of the team manager!

Make all the important decisions to lead your team to the top at the World Championship 2018 in Russia: choose the right tactics, optimize your line up and take care of your players!

An exciting live ticker with animated scenes and an atmospheric sound guarantees countless thrilling matches.

How could the world championship have gone if you were coach of the Netherlands or Italy?

Features
***********
- all groups, stadiums and schedules of World Championship 2018 in Russia
- coach rating and public highscore
- private highscore list with up to 10 friends
- direct matches with your friends in battle mode
- animated highlights recorded for every match
- many, many statistics
- English and German language
- option: Participation of the Netherlands or Italy
- available as Pro version too (editable player names and without ads)
